meta.author: 张晶

posts.title: Learn-Markdown
posts.text: 学习Markdown1. 标题1231-6个#快捷键：Ctrl(Command) + 1-6清除标题：Ctrl(Command) + 0 一级标题 # 一级标题二级标题 ## 二级标题三级标题 ### 三级标题四级标题 #### 四级标题五级标题 ##### 五级标题六级标题 ###### 六级标题 2. 文字标记 粗体： Bold **Bold**2. 斜体：Italic *Italic*3. 粗斜体：Bold Italic ***Bold Italic***4. 中划线：Inner Line ~~Inner Line~~5. 下划线：Underline _Underline_6. 中划线下划线：Innder Under List ~~_Innder Under List_~~7. 高亮显示：I will learn ==Python== later. I will learn ==Python== later. 3. 有序列表123451. 2. 3. 数字后面加"."加空格不添加序号：行尾 两个Enter键，或⬇️增加缩进(降级)：Tab减少缩进(升级)：Shift + Tab List One one two List Two List Three 123456Code:1. List One 1. one 2. two2. List Two3. List Three 4. 无序列表123456* - +"*"、"-"、"+"后面加空格无序列表可以和有序列表一起使用退出列表：行尾 两个Enter键，或⬇️增加缩进：Tab减少缩进：Shift + Tab List One with * List Two with * list 1 nesting Two list 2 nesting Two List Three with + List Four with - List nesting Four 12345678Code:* List One with ** List Two with * * list 1 nesting One * list 2 nesting One+ List Three with +- List Four with - - List nesting Four 5. 任务列表123"*或-或+"空格[空格或x]空格* [ ] - [x] + [ ]退出列表：行尾 两个Enter键，或⬇️ Unchecked Checked Unchecked 1234Code:* [ ] Unchecked- [x] Checked+ [ ] Unchecked 6. 表格 Column1 Column2 Column3 grape orange mango A B C 12345Code:| Column1 | Column2 | Column3|| --- | :---: | ---: || grape | orange | mango || A | B | C | 7. 引用 Something here 12Code:> Something here 8. 公式$$1 + 2 = 3$$ 1234Code:$$1 + 2 = 3$$ 9. 行内代码Python是一门编程语言print('Hello') 123Code:`Python`是一门编程语言`print('Hello')` 10. 代码块// javascript console.log('Hi');1console.log('Helo'); 12for i in range(10): print(i) Code: // javascript console.log(‘Hi’); ~~~ javascriptconsole.log(‘Hello’);~~~ ``` pythonfor i in range(10): print(i)``` 11. 标注Something words here[^mark1], a centercen.[^mark1]: content… 123Code:Something words here[^mark1], a centercen.[^mark1]: content... 12. 分割线--- ___ *** 13. 链接 方法1B站 12Code:[B站](https://bilibili.com "B站链接") 方法2B站 123Code:[B站][url][url]:https://bilibili.com "B站链接" 14. 图片 外部链接 方法1 12Code:![Cat Photo](https://res.wx.qq.com/wxdoc/dist/assets/img/0.4cb08bb4.jpg "A Cat Photo") 方法2 123Code:![Cat Photo][pic1][pic1]:https://res.wx.qq.com/wxdoc/dist/assets/img/0.4cb08bb4.jpg "A Cat Photo" 本地图片 方法1 12Code: ![Cat Photo](./cat.jpg "A Cat Photo") 方法2 123Code:![Cat Photo][pic2][pic2]:./cat.jpg "A Cat Photo"

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
